content.raw:
Now that gazebo has stopped crashing from my previous issue, I can run the DRC driving simulation program I have been working on for my project. The VRC cheats command seems to work in allowing the development aids, as the wheels can now turn when it is run.

However the vehicle still will not move, so either the issue is with the brake, handbrake, or accelerator. I adjusted values for all three, but no response. I wonder if there is a specfic value I need to put in as I believe these aids have had problems before.

The code can be found here: http://pastebin.com/mkExRXgx
content.html:
Now that gazebo has stopped crashing from my previous issue, I can run the DRC driving simulation program I have been working on for my project. The VRC cheats command seems to work in allowing the development aids, as the wheels can now turn when it is run.

However the vehicle still will not move, so either the issue is with the brake, handbrake, or accelerator. I adjusted values for all three, but no response. I wonder if there is a specfic value I need to put in as I believe these aids have had problems before.

The code can be found here: http://pastebin.com/mkExRXgx
